content:
Get comfy in this one bedroom suite, offering a queen bed, queen sofa pull out, fully equipped kitchenette, two televisions, and a full bath.

1 Queen Bed & 1 Sofa Bed
515 square feet / 47.8 square meters. Rate is for 1-4 people, maximum 6

STARTING FROM $127 PER NIGHT
* Excluding taxes, $3 per person per night Recreation Fee and 19% Service Charge.
